name: To Kill a Mockingbird
author: Harper Lee
description: A novel about the serious issues of rape and racial inequality.

author: George Orwell
description: A dystopian novel set in a totalitarian society ruled by Big Brother.

name: The Great Gatsby
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
description: A novel about the American dream and the disillusionment of the Jazz Age.

name: Moby Dick
author: Herman Melville
description: A novel about the voyage of the whaling ship Pequod.

name: War and Peace
author: Leo Tolstoy
description: A novel that chronicles the French invasion of Russia and its impact on Tsarist society.

name: The Hobbit
author: J.R.R. Tolkien
description: A fantasy novel and children's book by J.R.R. Tolkien.

name: Brave New World
author: Aldous Huxley
description: A dystopian social science fiction novel and cautionary tale about the future.
